subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Before Eric Mangini took over the Jets and guided them to Sunday’s all-or-nothing showdown against his former boss, Bill Belichick, the 1998 N.F.C. championship game pitted another mentor against his coaching protégé .
snippet: Before Eric Mangini took over the Jets and guided them to Sunday’s all-or-nothing showdown against his former boss, Bill Belichick, the 1998 N.F.C. championship game pitted another mentor against his coaching protégé .
